DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.CT_ID) FROM SM_CodeTable T1 INNER JOIN SM_Enum T2 ON T2.Enum_Key = 'CodeType' AND T2.Enum_ValueCode = T1.CT_Type
T1.CT_Type LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CT_Type#+'%'
T1.CT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CT_Name#+'%'
T1.CT_IsValid=#WHERE_CT_IsValid#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount', T1.CT_ID , T1.CT_Type , T1.CT_Name , T1.CT_Value , T1.CT_Desc , T1.CT_IsValid , T1.CT_CreatedBy , T1.CT_CreatedTime , T1.CT_UpdatedBy , T1.CT_UpdatedTime , T1.CT_VersionNo , T2.Enum_DisplayName FROM SM_CodeTable T1 INNER JOIN SM_Enum T2 ON T2.Enum_Key = 'CodeType' AND T2.Enum_ValueCode = T1.CT_Type
T1.CT_Type LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CT_Type#+'%'
T1.CT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CT_Name#+'%'
T1.CT_IsValid=#WHERE_CT_IsValid#
ORDER BY T1.CT_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
